metadata.title: CVE-2022-1309 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in developer tools in Google Chrome priorto 100.0.4896.88 allowed a remote attacker to potentially perform a sandboxescape via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
